episode_event_academy_winter02/8301_1001: I once visited your gallery in Unova.

You lived up to your nickname, the
Premier Insect Artist.

It was truly avant-garde, and the space
was marvelously artistic!

Wow! I’m honored to receive a compliment
from the Verdant Virtuoso himself!
I’ve heard a lot about you too, Brassius!

One day, I want to see Surrendering
Sunflora with my own eyes!

Heheheh! You’ll always be welcome in
Artazon!

I wonder what we would make if we
collaborated on an art piece!

I’d love to! What a challenge. I’d look
forward to that!

With grass Pokémon as my motif and
bug Pokémon as yours...

Although our work has its differences,
our passion for art is the same!

Our different values and ways of thinking
are precisely what would make a
collaboration so good!
episode_event_academy_winter02/8302_1001:
I hear you’re studying art particularly hard
even here on Pasio.

I decided my dream is to paint for a livin’...
So I wanna take it seriously.
Very good! I’m pleased to hear that!
Could I ask you something, Teach?

It seems you enjoy this whole teaching gig,
’cause it’s what you love to do.

Although being a teacher is fun, you’re also
responsible for guiding the lives of all your
students...and that can be tough.
But whenever I see students like you grow...

I know it was worth it, from the bottom of
my heart.
Then I guess I’ll have to do my best, too.

I took time off as a student at the academy
in Paldea.

But here on Pasio, I’m gonna take lots of
classes.

Oh, right. When Pasio Academy was
established...
Team Star was spearheading its foundation.

I... I didn’t expect you all to have grown
this much. I’m so moved...
episode_event_academy_winter02/8303_1001: Every day at Pasio Academy is so much fun!

There’s so much to learn, I don’t know
where to start!

How about you think of a theme for your
research?

That’s what Professor Elm studies back
in Johto!
I like that! Pokémon Eggs, huh?

In that case, there are a few things I might
be able to teach you!
The important thing is to focus on picnics!
In Paldea, Eggs are found while picnicking!
Wow, that’s the first I’ve heard of that!
Pokémon Eggs sure are full of mysteries!
episode_event_academy_winter02/8304_1001:
What are you most mindful of when
expressing Pokémon through art?

I started drawing because I want to learn
more about Pokémon.

I filled my Gym with silk string and cocoons
to better understand how bug Pokémon feel!
Huh?! Silk?! All over a Pokémon Gym?!

When enshrouded in a cocoon, you feel
happy and secure—like you can become
a new you!

Feeling things from a Pokémon’s point of
view... That seems kinda fun!

If I give that a try, I wanna be in a cocoon
with a bug Pokémon!
That way, I can see what they do in there!

Fantastic idea! How you enjoy my art is
entirely up to you!
I will! I’ll stop by if I’m ever in Unova!
